DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel study evaluate efficacy red yeast rice base nutraceutical ( monacolin K 10 mg/dose ) plus probiotic ( Bifidobacterium longum BB536 ® ) , versus placebo , patient moderate hypercholesterolemia , term improvement lipid profile cardiovascular risk .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Red Yeast Rice Based Nutraceutical Plus Probiotic Patients With Moderate Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: 18 ≤ men woman ≤ 70 men female . Female must postmenopausal surgically sterile 130 mg/dl ≤ LDLC ≤ 200 mg/dl patient primary cardiovascular prevention pregnancy lactate patient chronic disease patient serious hepatic disease patient serious renal disease patient thyroid disease diabetes mellitus glycemia > 126 mg/dl uncontrolled severe hypertension obesity ( BMI > 30 ) smoking status drug nutraceutical interfere experimental treatment
